attributes.comment:
Here is what it costs to file with USCIS for a couple just to adopt:

What it used to be when adoptions took place within 18 months:

I am an adoptive parent of a daughter from China and am in the process of
adopting a second child from China. Currently, my husband and I had to pay the
following fees:

I600A: $545

Fingerprints: $70 x 2 = $140

Total: $685

Adoptions are taking longer, and many families will have to renew their
fingerprints and application through the U.S. government while we wait for our
adoptions to be finalized. Due to the longer adoption process and you proposed
fee increase, we will have to pay additional:

I600A: $670 x 2 = $1340

Fingerprints: $80 x 4 = $ 320

Total: $1660

I ask that you not increase the fees. We are very excited about adopting again,
but this is an expensive process. Please do not make the financial burden for
families choosing to adopt more difficult. Thank you for your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Holly Friel
